price: 切莫居于否认安拉的迹象者的行列，以致你入于亏折者之中。
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnanna mina alladhīna kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi fatakūna mina al-khāsirīna
